author: Sarah Jorgensen
title: Holyoke Soldiers' Home, site of deadly outbreak, dealt with systemic issues for years, staffers and union say
description: Two employees of the Holyoke Soldiers' Home in Massachusetts told CNN they felt the home was woefully unprepared for a coronavirus outbreak in part due to long-standing systemic issues like short staffing.
content:
(CNN)Two employees of the Holyoke Soldiers' Home in Massachusetts told CNN they felt the home was woefully unprepared for a coronavirus outbreak in part due to long-standing systemic issues like short staffing.
